newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: CRICKET-WEST INDIES 152 FOR FOUR AT LUNCH.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-WEST INDIES 152 FOR FOUR AT LUNCH.

text.p: West Indies, chasing a target of 340 for victory, were 152 for four at lunch on the fifth and final day of the second cricket test against Australia at the Sydney Cricket Ground on Tuesday.

Scores - Australia 331 (Greg Blewett 69) and 312 for four declared (Matthew Elliott 78 retired hurt, Mark Waugh 67); West Indies 304 (Sherwin Campbell 77) and 152 for four (Shivnarine Chanderpaul 71).
